title: Menu Order
description: The schema of the data structure to store a order maded from a menu.

items.description: Array of items that are ordered.

uuid.description: The uuid of the ordered item.

customizations.description: Customizations on this item. An object using the customization uuid as key and the customization content as value.

name.description: The name of the customization item. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.

options.description: Selected customization options. An object using the option uuid as key and the option content as value.

name.description: The name of the customization option. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.

priceSubunits.description: The price of this customization option, in currency subunits. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.

amountSubunits.description: `priceSubunits * quantity` of this option, in currency subunits. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.

name.description: The name of the ordered item. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.

priceSubunits.description: The origional price of the ordered item (not including customizations), in currency subunits. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.

customizationsPrice.description: The sum of customizations price, in currency subunits. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.

amountSubunits.description: `(priceSubunits + customizationsPrice) * quantity`, in currency subunits. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.
The total amount of this order. This is a snapshot from the menu when the order is created or updated and will be populated by the server.
